long_description: Recharge your Black Diamond Apollo lantern, Orbit lantern or Icon headlamp while on the road with this Black Diamond NRG/NRG2 car charger. Plugs directly into any car's 12-volt socket and then into your NRG/NRG2-powered Black Diamond device. Status indicator lights let you know when charging is complete. Please note: You must purchase the NRG kit (for use with Apollo lantern and Icon headlamp) or the NRG2 kit (for use with Orbit lantern) in order to use this car charger. NRG Rechargeable Battery kit does not work with the 2012 version of the Icon; it's compatible with the Fall 2011 and older Icon headlamp.
short_description: Recharge your Black Diamond Apollo lantern, Orbit lantern or Icon headlamp while on the road with this Black Diamond NRG/NRG2 car charger.
